name: ElonMusk
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
After enabling the Elon Musk skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.
 
Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Elon Musk to the top of your news brief!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
